Text: Thanks for all the uploads Mirrormaster. It's appreciated. Do you have the new Ferals or Crossed Badlands 10-11? Thanks again.

Thanks for all the uploads, Mirror.  Between you and the other scanners, I'm all caught up (with the exception of 1 issue) and will seed everything as well.

As for the one I'm missing, I'm can't seem to find The Shade #2.  If anyone can upload that or provide me a link to where it already is uploaded, I'd greatly appreciate it.
